https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kcSbkaOeuU0u7NUwpg1e3fjCqm4.jpg On her 18th birthday, Ami Nonomura wants to meet her father and brother who live far away. While searching for her brother's house, she is attacked by a thief, but is helped by Hiroshi Tazaki. They fall in love but discover that they are siblings. Cream Lemon: Ami's Diary
